abstract: With a real sense of drama, the latest episode of "The X Factor" turns this watcher into a fan.
snippet: With a real sense of drama, the latest episode of "The X Factor" turns this watcher into a fan.
lead_paragraph: All right, now that the chaff has been separated, I'm completing my reluctant conversion into Fan of "The X Factor."

headline.main: 'X Factor' Watch: Yes, He'll Now Admit to Being a Fan
